directions: To make the dressing, place the balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, shallot, garlic, salt, and pepper in the bowl of a mini food processor. Pulse until blended. Slowly pour in the olive oil, and pulse again until thoroughly blended. Set aside or refrigerate until needed.
Divide lettuce between 6 serving plates, and top with red onion, almonds, strawberries, and feta cheese. Serve dressing on the side.
ingredients: 1 head red lettuce leaves, rinsed, dried, and torn
1/2 small red onion, peeled, cut into 1/2-inch-wide slivers
1 pint fresh strawberries, rinsed and sliced
title: Emily's Strawberry Balsamic Salad
